text: - Jonathan, I asked you to clean up this pigsty of a room.
Jonathan, don't ignore me! This place is a mess and it's your responsibility to keep it clean
- Oh, I am not ignoring you, Father. Your incessant prattling me all the time. I need to charge my first attack. Please continue.
- Jonathan, I do not have the patience for this.
Jonathan, I swear to God cut the theatrics and just clean up...
That's it. I'm getting your mother.
- Oh, man. You are in trouble now, Jonathan? I wonder what punishment mother will deliver. Ooooh!
- This isn't even my final form. I'll show you!
- Huh, looks like mom really put her foot down. Ooooh!
